description: This restaurant focuses on a skilful and creative reinterpretation of Campanian specialities, serving the type of cuisine that you’d be happy to eat every day. Although the dishes are inspired by the chef’s childhood memories and his grandmother’s cooking, he adds his own contemporary touch and careful presentation. Both meat and fish feature, showcasing all the colour and imagination of the best regional cuisine.
